AboutInfo.title: About Us
AboutInfo.description1: Ei Solutions is a tech company which offers EU-taxonomy services for the real estate sector. The company was founded 2021 in Trondheim out of research projects at NTNU's Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering.
AboutInfo.description2: The goal is to help the real estate industry to become more sustainable and to obtain the financial benefits it entails. The team consists of ambitious people with passion for sustainability, technology and real estate.

HeroBanner.title: Controlling financial climate risk in real estate
HeroBanner.description: Our practical solutions are securing sustainable financing and operations of real estate assets in an efficient manner.

0.title: Save time and costs with automatic mapping and follow-up.
0.description: We have gathered the data you need to assess physical climate risk and transition risk. Doing this job on your own is complex and time-consuming, so we've done it for you - all you need is an address.

0.title: Automatic Insight
0.description: Enter the address and find out which risks the properties are exposed to.

1.title: Digitalized follow-up
1.description: The tools guide you through the remaining steps and digitize follow-up and reporting.

2.title: Recommended Measures
2.description: Get recommendations on how you can work systematically to reduce climate risk in your portfolio.

1.title: Gain full control over financial climate risk and the taxonomy.
1.description: Today, experts say that it's crucial to start assessing and monitoring the portfolio against the taxonomy - we make the job easier.
1.0: EI Solutions has experience from hundreds of assessments, including third-party verification by DNV.
1.1: Our customers use the foundation to demonstrate to key stakeholders that they are managing sustainability risks adequately.
1.2: Our tools are developed in close collaboration with leading real estate companies.
